manifest.name: Note Chain
manifest.description: File sorting and hierarchical indentation display in the File Explorer. Provides efficient tools such as word count, text area, buttons, and note graph..
manifest.author: ZigHolding

data.manifestValue: File sorting and hierarchical indentation display in the File Explorer. Provides efficient tools such as word count, text area, buttons, and note graph..
data.communityListValue: Thoughts as river, notes as chain. Add prev and next notes to a notes, and order files by the chain in File Explorer.
